Ingredients.3: 1 pound beef sirloin steak, cut into 1-inch cubes

Ingredients.10: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.12: 0.5 cup beef broth, or more as needed

Directions.1: Heat oil and butter in a skillet over medium-high heat; stir in beef. Cook and stir until browned on all sides, 5 to 7 minutes, then remove to a plate.

Directions.2: Add mushrooms to the skillet and saute until soft, 3 to 4 minutes. Remove mushrooms to a plate.

Directions.3: Add onion and garlic to the skillet; saute until onion is beginning to turn translucent, about 3 minutes. Add tomatoes, parsley, oregano, salt, and pepper; simmer for 5 to 10 minutes. Add wine, 1/2 cup broth, and Parmesan cheese; simmer for 5 more minutes.

Directions.4: Stir in reserved beef and mushrooms. Cover and cook until beef is tender, about 1 hour, adding more broth if needed.
